thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com | 81 of 1355
thread.title: Alex Lystrup

author: Alex Lystrup
title: Alex Lystrup
text: Not much else to say, this was a pretty simple shopping experience. The listings were detailed and informative, and the prices are great. The shipping is a little pricey, but that's to be expected when you're transporting bulbs. For me, the shipping cost was the same whether I bought 2 or 20, so I bought in bulk to bring the unit price down considerably.
